articles.content: Imagine a tiny mistake at your job leads you to run three laps of your office. For employees at Ola this isnt a hypothetical situation but a real one. The company, which started as a ride-sharing pla… [+5267 chars]

articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.title: Chinese websites stealing information with free Diwali gift offers: CERT-In - The Indian Express
articles.description: Chinese websites are stealing victims' information by pretending to offer free Diwali gifts. Here is how the scam operates and how you can keep yourself safe.
articles.content: Diwali Gift Scam, Chinese Website: If you have received social media links to websites which promise free Diwali gifts, there is a good chance that the link is to a website trying to steal your infor… [+2214 chars]
